## OWebRouter.pathToURL() method

Builds url with a given path and base url.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
pathToURL(path: string, base?: string): URL;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  path | string | the path |
|  base | string | <i>(Optional)</i> the base url |

<b>Returns:</b>

URL
